description:
As an API consumer
  I want to create hotel room bookings
  So that guests can reserve rooms with their details

steps.name: Given the booking API is running
When I create a booking with "lastname" set to "Li" and all other fields valid
Then the response status code should be 400
And the error response should contain "size must be between 3 and 18"

statusDetails.message:
